bibl.title: Tragedija Evripida "Erekhfej". Avec résumé en anglais: Erechtheus, A Tragedy by Euripides.
bibl.note: Translation and commentary of the extant fragments. - The main idea and the action of the tragedy. - Dramatical and stylistic peculiarities.
bibl.seg: JARKHO V.N., Tragedija Evripida "Erekhfej". Avec résumé en anglais: Erechtheus, A Tragedy by Euripides.
Translation and commentary of the extant fragments. - The main idea and the action of the tragedy. - Dramatical and stylistic peculiarities.
